Joe Johnson

Joe Marcus Johnson

(Iso Joe, Joe Cool, Big Shot Joe, Armadillo Cowboy)

6-7, 240lb (201cm, 108kg)

Born: June 29, 1981 in Little Rock, Arkansas us

College: Arkansas

High School: Central in Little Rock, Arkansas

Recruiting Rank: 1999 (25)

Draft: Boston Celtics, 1st round (10th pick, 10th overall), 2001 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 30, 2001

Career Length: 18 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Joe Johnson?

Joe Johnson is 44 years old.

Where was Joe Johnson born?

Joe Johnson was born in Little Rock, Arkansas.

When was Joe Johnson born?

Joe Johnson was born on June 29, 1981.

How tall is Joe Johnson?

Joe Johnson is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.

How much did Joe Johnson weigh when playing?

Joe Johnson weighed 240 lbs (108 kg) when playing.

Is Joe Johnson in the Hall of Fame?

Joe Johnson is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Joe Johnson drafted?

Joe Johnson was drafted by Boston Celtics, 1st round (10th pick, 10th overall), 2001 NBA Draft.

What position did Joe Johnson play?

Shooting Guard and Small Forward.

When did Joe Johnson retire?

Joe Johnson last played in 2022.

What is Joe Johnson's net worth?

Joe Johnson made at least $220,412,627 playing professional basketball.

How much did Joe Johnson make?

Joe Johnson made $24,894,863 in 2016.

What did Joe Johnson average?

Joe Johnson averaged 16.0 points, 4.0 rebounds, and 3.9 assists per game.

How many rings does Joe Johnson have?

Joe Johnson won 0 championships.

What schools did Joe Johnson attend?

Joe Johnson attended Central in Little Rock, Arkansas and Arkansas.

What are Joe Johnson's nicknames?

Iso Joe, Joe Cool, Big Shot Joe, Armadillo Cowboy are nicknames for Joe Johnson.
